title: Battlefield 2042 Gets Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.16.21
description:
Get 25% off, up to $10 value, and zero delivery fees on your first order when you download the DoorDash app in the App Store and enter code GAMES2021.

Go to http://canva.me/kfgd to get your FREE 45 day extended trial!

Tamoor Hussain and Blessing talk Battlefield 2042, Deltarune Chapter 2, and more!

Follow Tam on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tamoorh

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:33 - Housekeeping
There’s a hot new episode of the PS I Love You XOXO and it is jam-packed with goodness including:
A Solar Ash preview fromAndy Cortez, A big ol’ breakdown of all of our unanswered questions from the PlayStation Showcase, Some chat about Twisted Metal, New PlayStation Studio talk, Of course, Deathloop talk
Also a reminder: It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny, the team is putting out banging streams every day between KFGD, Surgeon Sim plays, the Infamous baby race, MGS and so much more. Right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:12:37 - Battlefield 2042 Delayed To November 19 - Eddie Makuch and Gabe Gurwin, GameSpot
00:22:50 - Deltarune Chapter 2 lands this week -- PC Gamer, Shaun Prescott
00:36:15 - There’s A New Wipeout Game- Eurogamer Tom Phillips
00:43:30 - Confidentiality filing reveals Nintendo is planning a new Switch controller - VGC, Chris Scullion
00:51:45 - Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl Confirms October Release Date - IGN, Tylor Lyles
00:54:20 - Out today
01:03:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
